titleStmt.title: Publiqve faiths movrners, or, The sad breathings forth of many poore creditors (in and about London) to their debtors the members of Parliament; bewayling the sad regard hitherto had of these ensuing [and many other] acts and ordinances that hath been published to the world.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: print show-through, pages stained with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
